ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Vincent_Genot_012610_1
ResourceHeader.Description: A BATSRUS run Solar Wind input data (time series plot) : http://ccmc.gsfc.nasa.gov/RoR_WWW/GM/SWMF/2010/Vincent_Genot_012610_1/Vincent_Genot_012610_1_sw.gif Format description for the input file : http://ccmc.gsfc.nasa.gov/requests/SW_Input_Format.php

Property.Name: Inner boundary altitude from the center of the Earth
Property.Description: No resulting quantities are computed below this altitude

Property.Name: Tilt angle on the xz plane
Property.Description: Tilt angle of the Earthâs magnetic dipole in the GSE XZ plane. Positive when the Northern hemisphere points toward the Sun. Value at Time Start. Varies with time.

Property.Name: Tilt angle on the yz plane
Property.Description: Tilt angle of the Earthâs magnetic dipole in the GSE YZ plane. The angle increases clockwise when viewed from the Sun.

Property.Description: Altitude to which the simulation is performed
